About

Chris and Irina Harley have traveled the globe and experienced some of the worlds greatest marvels. In 2013 while stationed in the U.S Army in Germany Chris and Irina got the chance to experience a German beer spa and fell in love. They decided to bring the atmosphere to the United States and opened the first beer spa in Atlanta, Georiga.
